channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Aspera
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Aspera

item.title: CVE-2021-38870|2024-09-17T00:11:18.885Z -- ibm -- aspera
item.description: IBM Aspera Cloud is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 208343.
